```{r}
library(ape)
s = read.tree(text = '((?,?),?);' )
layout(matrix(c(1,1,2), 3, 1, byrow = TRUE))
plot(s,type = 'cladogram',edge.lty=c(1,1,2,1),font=6)
plot(c(0,1), c(0,1))
text(x = c(0.2,0.6), y = 1, '{', srt = 90, cex = 18)
```
